block.p: VORSCHIRM-Frank. Park East Synagogue mourns the passing of Frank Vorschirm, beloved father of our devoted members, Hillary and Joseph Soffer, Day School Board of Education member, grandfather of Early Childhood student Sabrina and Gabrielle. Deepest sympathy to the entire family. Rabbi Arthur Schneier Michael Scharf, President Jerry Forst, Vice President Jack Rosen, Vice President

VORSCHIRM-Franklin D. On April 29th, 2000. Beloved husband of Diana. Loving father of Hillary Soffer, Eric Vorschirm, Michael, Joshua and Daniel Bloom. Cherished grandfather to Sabrina and Gabrielle. Dear father-in-law of Joseph Soffer. A beloved friend to all. Services Tuesday, 10 AM, at ''The Riverside,'' 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue.
